text:
Kjartan Jóhannsson (19 December 1939 – 13 November 2020) an Icelandic politician. He was a member of the Social Democratic Party. Jóhannsson was born in Reykjavík, Iceland.
He was the Minister of Fisheries between 1978 to 1980. From 1979 to 1980, he was the Minister of Commerce.
Jóhannsson died on 13 November 2020 in Reykjavík at the age of 80.
